Axis Luncurkan Aplikasi Axisnet Berhadiah Vespa hingga Macbook
04 Nov 2019, 13:23 by Angga Laraspati - detikInet


Foto: Angga Laraspati

Jakarta -
Axis meluncurkan aplikasi Axisnet yang menawarkan berbagai keuntungan bagi anak muda sebagai priority customer. Chief Marketing Officer XL Axiata, David Arcelus Oses, mengatakan bahwa ini merupakan inovasi yang terus dikembangkan oleh Axis untuk terus menyenangkan pelanggannya.
"Mereka butuh aplikasi Axisnet yang bisa mempermudah mendapatkan produk atau layanan Axis, juga mendapatkan update informasi mengenai apa saja yang terkait dengan produk Axis. Pelanggan Axis adalah anak-anak muda yang dinamis, sehingga kami pun perlu menyesuaikan dengan karakter dan kebutuhan mereka," ujar David pada saat peluncuran aplikasi Axisnet di salah satu Restoran di bilangan Jakarta Selatan, Senin (4/11/2019).
Dia mengatakan memilih anak muda sebagai target merupakan tantangan bagi Axis. Sebab, menurutnya sifat anak muda agak pemilih. Tapi Axis mengerti keinginan dan kemauan anak muda zaman sekarang sehingga pada pemakaiannya nanti para user yang notabene anak muda bisa mendapatkan berbagai fitur menarik.
Head of Customer Experience Axis, Ferry Firman mengatakan bahwa akan ada 3 fiture di dalam aplikasi Axisnet ini. "Nantinya akan mendatangkan kemudahan dalam pemakaiannya, beserta diskon-diskon dan hadiah yang menarik tentunya," ujar Ferry.
Pertama, fitur kunci pulsa (lock button feature). Fitur ini merupakan yang pertama di Indonesia guna menghindarkan pelanggan dari kemungkinan pemotongan pulsa milik mereka secara otomatis karena terkena tarif dasar internet saat kuota habis atau hal tak terduga lainnya.
Kedua, fitur Special Offer Customized Product. Fitur ini secara otomatis akan mengidentifikasi karakter pelanggan dalam menggunakan layanan Axis sehari-hari. Alhasil, pelanggan akan diberikan penawaran paket Axis dengan harga/promo spesial sesuai kebutuhan pelanggan. Selain itu, pelanggan juga bisa memperoleh harga produk terbaik di Axisnet.
Setelah itu, fitur ketiga dari Axisnet yaitu layanan "Super Sureprize", merupakan program undian yang hanya bisa diikuti oleh pelanggan Axis.
Untuk mengikuti program "Super Sureprize" ini, pelanggan hanya cukup membeli paket internet bulanan yang dapat dibeli melalui aplikasi Axisnet atau voucher AIGO di toko pulsa. Pelanggan hanya perlu scan kode AIGO di aplikasi Axisnet.
Setelahnya, secara otomatis pelanggan akan terdaftar dalam program dan memiliki kesempatan memenangkan hadiah utama Vespa, Samsung Galaxy A50, Macbook Pro 13" dan hadiah menarik lainnya.
Selanjutnya akan menyusul di bulan November ini, fitur multipayment. Fitur ini memberikan kemudahan pelanggan saat melakukan pembelian paket Axis, selain membayar dengan pulsa, mereka juga bisa melakukan pembayaran melalui beragam platform digital yang tersedia.
Brand Axis merupakan bagian dari XL Axiata yang ditujukan untuk pelanggan segmen anak-anak muda, termasuk mahasiswa. Saat ini Axis memiliki produk unggulan yaitu paket OWSEM dan paket Boostr, yang mampu memenuhi kebutuhan pelanggan. Pada produk OWSEM, pelanggan bisa mendapatkan manfaat berupa unlimited gaming dengan kuota utama, kuota sosial media, kuota malam dan kuota musik.
Sementara itu pada produk Boostr pelanggan bisa mendapatkan manfaat berupa paket internet untuk aplikasi, yang bisa dipilih sesuai dengan kebutuhan mereka, kedua paket ini pun bisa pelanggan dapatkan melalui aplikasi Axisnet.

Axis Launches the Axisnet Rewards Vespa to Macbook Prizes
Nov 04 2019, 13:23 by Angga Laraspati - detikInet


Photo: Angga Laraspati

Jakarta -
Axis launches Axisnet application which offers various advantages for young people as priority customers. XL Axiata's Chief Marketing Officer, David Arcelus Oses, said that this is an innovation that Axis continues to develop to continue to delight its customers.
"They need an Axisnet application that can make it easier to get Axis products or services, also get updated information about anything related to Axis products. Axis customers are dynamic young people, so we also need to adjust to their character and needs," said David at the launch of the Axisnet application in a restaurant in South Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019).
He said choosing young people as targets was a challenge for Axis. Because, according to him the nature of young people is rather picky. But Axis understands the desires and wishes of young people today so that in their use later users who incidentally young people can get a variety of interesting features.
Axis Head of Customer Experience, Ferry Firman said that there will be 3 features in this Axisnet application. "Later it will bring ease in its use, along with discounts and attractive gifts of course," Ferry said.
First, the pulse lock feature (lock button feature). This feature is the first in Indonesia to prevent customers from automatically deducting their credit due to the basic internet tariff when the quota runs out or other unexpected things.
Second, the Special Offer Customized Product features. This feature will automatically identify the customer's character in using Axis daily services. As a result, customers will be offered Axis package deals with special prices / promos according to customer needs. In addition, customers can also get the best product prices on Axisnet.
After that, Axisnet's third feature, the "Super Sureprize" service, is a lottery program that can only be followed by Axis customers.
To join the "Super Sureprize" program, customers only need to buy a monthly internet package that can be purchased through the Axisnet application or an AIGO voucher at a credit shop. Customers only need to scan the AIGO code in the Axisnet application.
After that, customers will automatically be enrolled in the program and have a chance to win the grand prize of the Vespa, Samsung Galaxy A50, Macbook Pro 13 "and other attractive prizes.
Next will follow in this November, the multipayment feature. This feature makes it easy for customers when purchasing Axis packages, in addition to paying by credit, they can also make payments through a variety of available digital platforms.
The Axis brand is part of XL Axiata which is aimed at customers of the youth segment, including students. Axis currently has superior products, namely the OWSEM package and the Boostr package, which are able to meet customer needs. In OWSEM products, customers can get benefits in the form of unlimited gaming with the main quota, social media quota, night quota and music quota.
Meanwhile, on Boostr products customers can get benefits in the form of internet packages for applications, which can be selected according to their needs, both of these packages can be obtained by customers through the Axisnet application.
